Additional_remarks: Incomplete. Folios are torn. F.1 has turned into pieces. Edges torn. The text is damaged both. (a) (b) (c) Complete. (d) Incomplete. Ends abruptly.

creator: Chunilal Gandhi Vidyabhavan Surat
description: Pandit Shivadatta Shukla collection of manuscripts of Chunilal Gandhi Vidyabhavan, Surat.
